Set your API keys so they can be accessed by EndpointR

Source: R/utils.R
set_api_key.Rd

Set an API key for each endpoint - where endpoint could be Anthropic, OpenAI, a specific Hugging Face Inference endpoint, or another supported provider. Add overwrite=TRUE if you need to update an existing key. You will then be able to retrieve the key with the get_api_key() function.

Usage

set_api_key(key_name, overwrite = FALSE)

Arguments

key_name

The name of the API in the format "ENDPOINT_API_KEY" -> "ANTHROPIC_API_KEY"

overwrite

Whether to overwrite an existing value for the API key.

Value

Nothing

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
  # set an Anthropic API key
  set_api_key("ANTHROPIC_API_KEY")

  # update an existing OpenAI key
  set_api_key("OPENAI_API_KEY", overwrite = TRUE)
} # }
